tools.mdcat2: Formats source files into markdown for GPT chat
tools.pext: Extracts User prompts from ChatGPT chats (in json)
tools.aug: Augment AI Pipeline - Process chat exports through extraction, analysis, and schema generation
tools.aug-recap: Extract esence from AugmentedAI plugin chats
tools.export-chats: Export chats from json chats file
tools.rsum: React Summary - Analyzes React component and test files to generate structured summaries
tools.pysum: Python project structure generator - Creates Markdown documentation from Python files
tools.lsproj: Project file lister - Uses .projlist config for pattern-based file discovery
